storylines.title: Storyline A: Premeditated Financial Network
storylines.description: Evidence suggests a well-organized, pre-planned financial laundering operation spanning 3 countries with at least 5 key participants.

storylines.title: Storyline B: Opportunistic Drug Trade Laundering
storylines.description: Evidence alternatively suggests the financial transactions are tied to an opportunistic drug trade operation initiated after a chance meeting.

events.title: Initial Planning Meeting
events.description: GPS data places Ravi Kumar and Priya M at Hotel Grand Hyatt, Mumbai for 2.5 hours. 14 WhatsApp messages exchanged during this window.

events.title: Hawala Network Compromised
events.description: Ghost_Handler sends encrypted Signal message warning Ravi that their hawala channel has been compromised. Instructs switch to Binance P2P.

events.title: New Burner Phone Activated
events.description: Call log shows Ravi activated a new SIM card (+91-87654-32100). First outgoing call to +971-55-1234567 (Dubai).

events.title: SWIFT Transfer Received
events.description: SMS confirms INR 4,99,999 credited via SWIFT transfer. Remaining balance forwarded to Bitcoin address BC1q…wlh.

events.title: USDT Transfer to Dubai
events.description: Late-night message confirms 50K USDT sent to crypto wallet 0x7a3B…f9c1 linked to Dubai contact.

events.title: Wire Transfer via HSBC Dubai
events.description: Dark_Phoenix_99 confirms wire transfer cleared through HSBC Dubai. References a shell company for routing funds.

events.title: Cash Pickup & Crypto Conversion
events.description: Priya confirms physical cash collected at Andheri, converted to Tether (USDT), and sent to cold storage wallet.

events.title: Escrow & Customs Clearance
events.description: UK number confirms funds in escrow, pending customs clearance of shipment at Mumbai port.

events.title: Final BTC Conversion Order
events.description: Ravi orders group to convert all proceeds to BTC and forward to Dubai contact. Explicitly states 'No traces.'

events.title: Chance Encounter at Club
events.description: Gallery photos place Ravi and Dark_Phoenix_99 at Trilogy nightclub, Mumbai. First known physical meeting.

events.title: Spontaneous Deal Discussion
events.description: Rapid burst of 23 messages between Ravi and Dark_Phoenix_99 immediately after nightclub visit suggests unplanned deal.
